motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of multiple meeting minutes from March 2025, renewal of Microsoft licenses, Fortinet maintenance licenses, and MOU with U.S. Naval Criminal Investigation Service for LInX.

motions.title: Table Flock Safety 6-month Trial Agreement
motions.description: Motion to table the 6-month trial agreement with Flock Safety until the April 28th city council meeting.

motions.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
motions.description: Motion to enter executive session for legal and personnel discussion.
